com.facebook.react.views.modal

Class ReactModalHostManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NativeModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RCTModalHostManager

    public class ReactModalHostManager
extends ViewGroupManager<ReactModalHostView>
    View manager for ReactModalHostView components.

      • createShadowNodeInstance

        public LayoutShadowNode createShadowNodeInstance()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        This method should return a subclass of ReactShadowNode which will be then used for measuring position and size of the view. In mose of the cases this should just return an instance of ReactShadowNode
        Overrides:
        createShadowNodeInstance in class ViewGroupManager<ReactModalHostView>

      • getShadowNodeClass

        public java.lang.Class<? extends LayoutShadowNode> getShadowNodeClass()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        This method should return Class instance that represent type of shadow node that this manager will return from ViewManager.createShadowNodeInstance(). This method will be used in the bridge initialization phase to collect properties exposed using ReactProp (or ReactPropGroup) annotation from the ReactShadowNode subclass specific for native view this manager provides.
        Overrides:
        getShadowNodeClass in class ViewGroupManager<ReactModalHostView>
        Returns:
        Class object that represents type of shadow node used by this view manager.

      • addEventEmitters

        protected void addEventEmitters(ThemedReactContext reactContext,
                                ReactModalHostView view)
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Subclasses can override this method to install custom event emitters on the given View. You might want to override this method if your view needs to emit events besides basic touch events to JS (e.g. scroll events).
        Overrides:
        addEventEmitters in class ViewManager<ReactModalHostView,LayoutShadowNode>

      • getExportedCustomDirectEventTypeConstants

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getExportedCustomDirectEventTypeConstants()
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Returns a map of config data passed to JS that defines eligible events that can be placed on native views. This should return non-bubbling directly-dispatched event types. Returned map should be of the form: { "onTwirl": { "registrationName": "onTwirl" } }
        Overrides:
        getExportedCustomDirectEventTypeConstants in class ViewManager<ReactModalHostView,LayoutShadowNode>

      • onAfterUpdateTransaction

        protected void onAfterUpdateTransaction(ReactModalHostView view)
        Description copied from class: ViewManager
        Callback that will be triggered after all properties are updated in current update transaction (all @ReactProp handlers for properties updated in current transaction have been called). If you want to override this method you should call super.onAfterUpdateTransaction from it as the parent class of the ViewManager may rely on callback being executed.
        Overrides:
        onAfterUpdateTransaction in class ViewManager<ReactModalHostView,LayoutShadowNode>
